description: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(A014580(n)) = A065621(1+a(n)), a(A091242(n)) = A048724(a(n)), where A065621(n) and A048724(n) give the reversing binary representation of n and -n, respectively, and A014580 resp. A091242 are the binary coded irreducible resp. reducible polynomials over GF(2).
